results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to see food item types displayed in different colors so that I can quickly identify food types.
results.optional_explanation: The goal specifies RGB color codes, which are technical details. The user story should focus on the goal of quick identification, not the implementation.

results.corrected_us: As a reader, I want to bookmark pages so that I can find relevant content easily later.
results.optional_explanation: Role is clear and specific, goal is user-facing, and value is benefit-focused.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save my list so that I can reuse, print, or email it later.

results.corrected_us: As a blogger who codes, I want the blogging system to integrate with GitHub so that my readers can see my GitHub activity in my profile.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save, copy, print, and email my list so that I can manage and share it for various purposes.
results.optional_explanation: Multiple unrelated actions make this story ultra-huge, but the focus is on the goal of managing the list, so ID 3 is appropriate.
